ofcprobe.vswitch.main.config

Class Config

  • java.lang.Object
    • ofcprobe.vswitch.main.config.Config

  • public class Config
extends java.lang.Object
    This is a Meta-Config. It holds the Configuration for the ofSwitchRunner, ofSwitches and concording StatisticModules and finally the TrafficGenerator.
    Author:
    Christopher Metter(christopher.metter@informatik.uni-wuerzburg.de)
